name: You are just a solider
description:
WARNING: If you get stuck try doing something different to the first target, as it determines which level you play first, also this is my FIRST game, I made more, but I want to upload them in order.

In this game you are a solider doing orders, you can kill your targets OR let them live, giving different results.

Please leave thoughts and tips for me as this is my first game in the disscusion board
